item.title: Amy add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "If we, citizens, do not support our artists, then we sacrifice our imagination on the altar of crude reality and we end up believing in nothing and having worthless dreams." -- Yann Martel

item.title: Amy add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "Hindus, in their capacity for love, are indeed hairless Christians, just as Muslims, in the way they see God in everything, are bearded Hindus, and Christians, in their devotion to God, are hat wearing Muslims." -- Yann Martel

item.title: Amy add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "Can there be any happiness greater than the happiness of salvation?" -- Yann Martel

item.title: Amy add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "The presence of God is the finest of rewards." -- Yann Martel

item.title: Amy add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "To me, religion is about our dignity, not our depravity." -- Yann Martel

item.title: Amy add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "The paths to liberation are numerous, but the bank along the way is always the same, the Bank of Karma, where the liberation account of each of us is credited or debited depending on our actions." -- Yann Martel

item.title: Amy add a quote by Jodi Piccoult
item.description: "You know how hind-sight is 20/20? Love is when you look back and wouldn't change anything." -- Jodi Piccoult

item.title: Amy add a quote by Dave Ramsey
item.description: "We buy things we don't need with money we don't have to impress people we don't like." -- Dave Ramsey

item.title: Amy add a quote by Dave Ramsey
Amy add a quote by Anne Frank
item.description: "I don't have much in the way of money or worldly possessions, I'm not beautiful, intelligent or clever, but I'm happy, and I intend to stay that way! I was born happy, I love people, I have a trusting nature, and I'd like everyone else to be happy too. " -- Anne Frank

item.title: Amy add a quote by Joyce Meyer (Author)
item.description: "Happiness is not a feeling, it is a choice. To be happy, one must choose to be happy, not respond to a circumstance that now controls your happiness." -- Joyce Meyer (Author)

item.title: Amy add a quote by Joyce Meyer
item.description: "you have to realize that you don't have someone else's life and your never going to. You better start loving the one you got. Embrass the life you have and stop wishing that you could be someone else. Just stop all that and start saying "God here I am. Do what you want to do with me"." -- Joyce Meyer

item.title: Amy add a quote by Joyce Meyer
item.description: "Our joy does not have to be based on our circumstances." -- Joyce Meyer

item.title: Amy add a quote by Edward Abbey
item.description: "I am not an atheist but an earthiest. Be true to the earth." -- Edward Abbey

item.title: Amy add a quote by Beth Moore
item.description: "You cannot amputate your history from your destiny, because that is redemption." -- Beth Moore

item.title: Amy add a quote by Joyce Meyer
item.description: "You can suffer the pain of change or suffer remaining the way you are." -- Joyce Meyer

item.title: Amy add a quote by Joyce Meyer
item.description: "You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind." -- Joyce Meyer
